revision.text:
=== Discussion: Should it readily list the time per farm point of each berry? === :This information is already listed on [[Farm Points]]. The main [[Berries]] page is probably not where we would want this information, it is a little too niche and particular to Farm Points. [[User:Jk13|Jk13]] ([[User talk:Jk13|talk]]) 20:21, 27 December 2021 (UTC) :Can't believe I missed that... Good point --[[User:Playername|Playername]] ([[User talk:Playername|talk]]) 11:01, 1 January 2022 (UTC)
Additionally, a correction for the page: Chesto has 40s to death, not 30s.
== Error in sentence ==
"You can trade certain berries can be traded for Masterballs, Protein, and other Evolution Items at Berry Master shops.", the second sentence of the berries wiki entry (https://pokeclicker.miraheze.org/wiki/Berries), doesnt make sense gramatically. It should either be "You can trade certain berries for Masterballs, Protein and other Evolution Items at the Berry Master shops." or "Berries can be traded for Masterballs, Protein, and other Evolution Items at Berry Master shops.", not both at the same time.
Low priority fix as it doesn't change the information, however i believe it'd be quite easy to edit. *Good catch, updated! [[User:Jk13|Jk13]] ([[User talk:Jk13|talk]]) 07:02, 14 February 2022 (UTC)

=== Discussion: Should it readily list the time per farm point of each berry? === :This information is already listed on [[Farm Points]]. "You can trade certain berries can be traded for Masterballs, Protein, and other Evolution Items at Berry Master shops.", the second sentence of the berries wiki entry (https://pokeclicker.miraheze.org/wiki/Berries), doesnt make sense gramatically. It should either be "You can trade certain berries for Masterballs, Protein and other Evolution Items at the Berry Master shops." or "Berries can be traded for Masterballs, Protein, and other Evolution Items at Berry Master shops.", not both at the same time.
Low priority fix as it doesn't change the information, however i believe it'd be quite easy to edit.

Low priority fix as it doesn't change the information, however i believe it'd be quite easy to edit.

revision.comment: Created page with "=== Discussion: Should it readily list the time per farm point of each berry? === Could be useful information. Can already be calculated manually for each berry, but the list of berries has gotten quite long making it rather slow. I've calculated and sorted it for the current (25/12/2021) values: {| class="wikitable" |+ Farm points per second for each berry, sorted by fastest. |- ! Berry !! Farm points !! Total seconds to ripe !! Seconds per farm point |- | Lum || 10..."
